org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.compactions

类 PartitionedMobCompactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.compactions.MobCompactor
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mob.compactions.PartitionedMobCompactor

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class PartitionedMobCompactor
extends MobCompactor
    An implementation of MobCompactor that compacts the mob files in partitions.

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      The number of files compacted in a batch

    • 方法详细资料

      • compact

        public List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> compact(List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> files,
                                               boolean allFiles)
                                        throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: MobCompactor
        Compacts the candidate mob files.
        指定者:
        compact 在类中 MobCompactor
        参数:
        files - The candidate mob files.
        allFiles - Whether add all mob files into the compaction.
        返回:
        The paths of new mob files generated in the compaction.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • select

        protected PartitionedMobCompactionRequest select(List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus> candidates,
                                                 boolean allFiles)
                                          throws IOException
        Selects the compacted mob/del files. Iterates the candidates to find out all the del files and small mob files.
        参数:
        candidates - All the candidates.
        allFiles - Whether add all mob files into the compaction.
        返回:
        A compaction request.
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered

      • performCompaction

        protected List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> performCompaction(PartitionedMobCompactionRequest request)
                                                     throws IOException
        Performs the compaction on the selected files.
        1. Compacts the del files.
        2. Compacts the selected small mob files and all the del files.
        3. If all the candidates are selected, delete the del files.
        参数:
        request - The compaction request.
        返回:
        The paths of new mob files generated in the compaction.
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered

      • compactMobFiles

        protected List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> compactMobFiles(PartitionedMobCompactionRequest request)
                                                   throws IOException
        Compacts the selected small mob files and all the del files.
        参数:
        request - The compaction request.
        返回:
        The paths of new mob files after compactions.
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered

      • compactDelFiles

        protected List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> compactDelFiles(PartitionedMobCompactionRequest request,
                                                          List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> delFilePaths)
                                                   throws IOException
        Compacts the del files in batches which avoids opening too many files.
        参数:
        request - The compaction request.
        delFilePaths - Del file paths to compact
        返回:
        The paths of new del files after merging or the original files if no merging is necessary.
        抛出:
        IOException - if IO failure is encountered
